alert.note: Alert for San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands; Santa Cruz and Anacapa Islands (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 03 at 3:13PM PDT until April 03 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 35 to 45 mph with damaging gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands and Santa Cruz and Anacapa Islands. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands; Santa Cruz and Anacapa Islands
